title: Joon-Klaps/viralgenie pipeline - params.mapping_sequences schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.mapping_sequences

id.errorMessage: Sequence ID must be provided and cannot contain spaces or special characters with the exception of '-' and '.'

sequence.errorMessage: Fasta file for mapping must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fa', '.fasta' or '.fna' (unzipped)

species.errorMessage: Species cannot contain spaces or special characters with the exception of '-' and '.'

segment.errorMessage: Segment cannot contain spaces or special characters with the exception of '-' and '.'
